mapper.select: SELECT gno, gname, stock, gdetail, price, dir, savename, score FROM goods g, img i, review r WHERE g.ino = i.ino AND g.ino = r.ino AND gno = #{gno}
SELECT cano, caname FROM category WHERE upno IS NULL
SELECT cano, caname FROM category WHERE #{cano} = upno
SELECT gno, gname, savename, dir, price FROM goods g, img i WHERE g.ino = i.ino AND cano = #{cano}

select r.gno gno, r.gname gname, r.price price, c.cano cano, r.dir dir, r.savename savename, caname from ( select c.gno gno, c.gname gname, c.price price, c.cano cano, i.dir dir, i.savename savename from ( SELECT gno, cano FROM goods g, img i WHERE gno = #{gno} and g.ino = i.ino ) s, goods c, img i where s.cano = c.cano and c.ino = i.ino )r, category c where c.cano = r.cano
select gno, gname, savename, dir, price from goods g, category c, img i where g.cano = c.cano AND g.gno = i.ino AND gname like '%' || #{gname} || '%'

SELECT rno, dir, savename, TO_CHAR(rdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') rdate, gname, title, body, score FROM goods g, transaction t, ( SELECT dir, savename, tno, body, title, score, rdate, rno FROM img i, review r WHERE i.ino = r.ino ) rr WHERE t.gno = g.gno AND rr.tno = t.tno AND g.gno = #{gno} ORDER BY rdate desc
